This Wikipedia article provides a list of notable individuals identified as ufologists, defined as people who investigate the possibility of UFOs being linked to extraterrestrial aliens. The list is organized by country. The article also includes a maintenance template indicating that it relies excessively on primary sources and needs improvement with secondary or tertiary sources.
